title: Blue
content:
Blue may refer to:

  • Blue armour
  • Rune, a sky blue metal.
  • Saradomin, a god associated with the colour blue.

Monsters[edit | edit source]

  • Dragons:
    • Baby blue dragon
    • Blue dragon
    • Brutal blue dragon

Items[edit | edit source]

  • Blue dragonhide items:
    • Blue dragonhide
    • Blue dragon leather
    • Blue d'hide body, and its trimmed and gold-trimmed versions.
    • Blue d'hide chaps, and its trimmed and gold-trimmed versions.
    • Blue d'hide vambraces
    • Blue spiky vambraces
    • Blue d'hide shield
  • Holiday items:
    • Deflated blue bouncy ball
    • Blue bouncy ball
    • Blue halloween mask
    • Blue marionette
    • Blue paper hat
    • Blue partyhat
    • Blue rainbow strand
    • Polished blue gem
    • Semi-precious blue gem
  • Mystic robes:
    • Mystic hat
    • Mystic robe top
    • Mystic robe bottom
    • Mystic boots
    • Mystic gloves
  • Rometti's Fine Fashions items:
    • Blue hat
    • Blue robe top
    • Blue robe bottoms
    • Blue boots
  • The Eyes of Glouphrie items:
    • Blue circle
    • Blue pentagon
    • Blue square
    • Blue triangle
  • Treasure Trail items:
    • Bob's blue shirt
    • Blue beret
    • Blue boater
    • Blue cavalier
    • Blue dragon mask
    • Blue elegant blouse
    • Blue elegant legs
    • Blue elegant shirt
    • Blue elegant skirt
    • Blue firelighter
    • Blue headband
    • Blue wizard hat (t)
    • Blue wizard robe (t)
    • Blue skirt (t)
    • Blue wizard hat (g)
    • Blue wizard robe (g)
    • Blue skirt (g)
  • Trouble Brewing items:
    • Bowl of blue water
    • Blue flowers
    • Blue monkey
    • Rewards:
      • Blue tricorn hat
      • Blue naval shirt
      • Blue navy slacks
  • Blamish blue shell
  • Blue cape
  • Blue cog, an item used in the Clock Tower quest.
  • Blue crystal, an item used in the Mourning's End Part II quest.
  • Blue dark bow paint
  • Blue dragon scale, and its ground down version.
  • Blue dye
  • Blue dye bellows, an item used in the Mourning's End Part I quest.
  • Blue egg, an item used in the Barbarian Assault minigame.
  • Blue feather
  • Blue flowers
  • Blue goblin mail, an item used in the Goblin Diplomacy quest.
  • Blue hat, an item used in the Legends' Quest.
  • Blue logs
  • Blue skirt
  • Blue slayer helmet, and its imbued version.
  • Blue thread, an item used in The Fremennik Trials quest.
  • Blue toad, an item used in the Mourning's End Part I quest.
  • Blue wizard hat
  • Bruise blue snelm
  • Fremennik blue cloak
  • Fremennik blue shirt

Other[edit | edit source]

  • Blue Opal a dwarven mining company in Keldagrim and its associates:
    • Blue Opal Director
    • Blue Opal Secretary
  • Blue Moon Inn, a location.
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
